member.name: STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_THRESHOLD
member.summary: This structure is used to set the over or under temperature threshold of a storage device (via IOCTL_STORAGE_SET_TEMPERATURE_THRESHOLD).

member.name: STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_THRESHOLD.Size
member.summary: The size of this structure. This should be set to sizeof(STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_THRESHOLD).

summary.para: Flags set for this request. The following are valid flags.

listheader.description: This flag indicates the request to target an adapter instead of device.

member.name: STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_THRESHOLD.Index
member.summary: Identifies the instance of temperature information. Starts from 0. Index 0 may indicate a composite value.

member.name: STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_THRESHOLD.Threshold
member.summary: A signed value that indicates the temperature of the threshold, in degrees Celsius.

member.name: STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_THRESHOLD.OverThreshold
member.summary: Indicates if the Threshold specifies the over or under temperature threshold. If true, set the OverThreshold temperature value of the device; otherwise, set the UnderThreshold temperature value.
